title: Reapproval of Carmichael mine ‘a bad idea on every level’ (Greenpeace Australia Pacific)
text: ( Source : Greenpeace Australia Pacific ) Brisbane , 15 October , 2015 - Greenpeace Australia Pacific today condemned the federal government's decision to reissue approval for the biggest new coal mine in Australia - Adani's highly controversial
